item.title: Security Tools
item.description: Tools I have experience with but not limited to: Microsoft: Azure, o365, Exchange Admin, Purview, Defender for Cloud App Trend Micro Suite: Vision one, Tipping Point IPS, Deep Discovery suite, Email Security, Apex One, Cloud App CyberArk: privilege Access Manager (PAM), Vendor remote access (Alero), Endpoint privilege Manager (EPM) Git Wireshark Zscaler BurpSuite SIEM: IBM Qradar, Forescout Cysiv vulnerability assessment & Threat intelligence: Rapid 7 IVM, Intsights Threat command OS: MacOS, Windows, Linux
